Being blind for so long had served Tucson very well. No only could he hear =
what was coming at him, he could also feel it.  Again this ability serves h=
im, as he manages to dodge the enemy fire and respond by using another sona=
r wave thrown at Nightstrike, quickly picking up on his distance, location =
and energy signature.  

"Now this is more like it! Nice try, now it's my t=
urn!"

His hand is quick at loading the plasma tipped arrows, and within se=
conds begins to carefully aim and fire at Nightstrike.  His sonar systems a=
lso pick up the signatures in other rooms, as he soon finds out that Nights=
trike isn't the only adversary in the base.

" Ravenchief, Guardia, there's=
 something else in the next room. Check it out, I don't think it's friendly=
.  Talon, I need you to do a sweep of the other chambers inside this base, =
I'll do what I can to fend off whoever is firing at us."  

Like a true Aut=
obot, Tucson stands his ground firmly.  He continues to implement his sonar=
 equipment and catches each and every move Nightstrike makes.  As he moves,=
 he deciphers how close or how far he is from Nightstrike, by the frequency=
 of the pings he hears through his sonar system.  Each wave he sends off, t=
he pings come back more frequently and louder.  Until he finds himself righ=
t behind Nightsrike.  He pokes his shoulder to let him know that there was =
no hiding from this bot, even though he was visually impaired.

" Tag, you'=
re it."

e that there could be someone else here besides the Maximal in the CR Chamb=

> 
> " I kne=
w it. All right, fun's over! You called me pathetic and now you lay in hidi=
ng somewhere in this vicinity! I'm not tolerating your charades and there's=
 no way in the name of Primus I'm going to let you harm my comrades or any =
surviving Maximal in this base! I demand that you show yourself immediately=
!" 
> 
> He places himself in front of the CR chamber, as any Autobot would=
 do, to stand guard vigilantly. Yet, he knows not to open fire in the base =
so is not to harm any innocent bistanders inside the complex.
> 
> "Tucson =
to Perseus, The base seems abandoned yet, there is a Maximal down here insi=
de. But there's something else here and hasn't made itself visible yet. In =
fact, I might have been the only one to hear him.. I'm sending you my sonar=
 data now. "
> 
> He interfaces with the computer on Lord Perseus's ship, a=
nd downloads his data, showing the two pings he had picked up using his son=
ar equipment.
